entities.name: dumbledore's army
entities.description: Dumbledore's Army is mentioned as a group of people who are part of the story.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who had knitted scarves for Harry Potter.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is mentioned as Harry's owl and is seen sitting on top of a bobble.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is an elf who volunteered to return Harry Potter's owl.

entities.name: professor grubbly-plank
entities.description: Professor Grubbly-Plank is mentioned as someone who says that the owl is all well now.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as the owner of the owl and is seen talking to Dobby.

relationships.description: Dobby volunteered to return Harry Potter's owl.
Professor Grubbly-Plank says that the owl is all well now.
Dobby is seen wearing a scarf with Hedwig on top of it.
Harry thanks Dobby for returning his owl.
